weapons.name: Sword of the Dawn Ages
weapons.description: Type: Hand Weapon. Attacks made with this weapon gain +1 Strength and Multiple Wounds (2).

weapons.name: Spear of the Stampede
weapons.description: Type: Lance. The wielder’s mount gains Impact Hits (+D6).

weapons.name: Spear of the Stampede
weapons.description: Type: Bow. The wielder may elect to replace its normal Shooting Attack and instead use the rules for Bolt Thrower Artillery Weapons with the following profile: Range 18ps, Strength 3[6], Armour Piercing (6), [Multiple Wounds (D3)].

armours.name: Taurosaur Helm
armours.description: models on foot only. Type: None (6+ Armour Save). The wearer gains +1 Toughness and Impact Hits (1).

talismans.name: Starfall Shard
talismans.description: The bearer’s model gains Fireborn and Hard Target

enchanteditems.name: Egg of the Quetzal
enchanteditems.description: The bearer gains a Breath Weapon (Strength D3+2, Magical Attacks).

enchanteditems.name: Jade Staff
enchanteditems.description: The bearer can cast Healing Waters from Druidism as a Bound Spell (Power Level 3)

arcaneitems.name: EggAncient Plaque
arcaneitems.description: Once per friendly Magic Phase, the bearer may reroll one Magic Dice that was used for a casting attempt. This ability cannot be used when the bearer is casting with only one Magic Dice, and cannot reroll a dice which was a natural ‘6’.

arcaneitems.name: Black Cube
arcaneitems.description: One use only. The bearer may activate this item in the opponent’s Magic Phase, after Magic Flux and Channelling have been rolled. When activated, remove 1 Magic Dice from the opponent’s Magic Dice Pool, and add 1 Magic Dice to the owner’s Magic Dice Pool

standards.name: Totem of Mixoatl
standards.description: R&F model parts with Born Predator in bearer’s unit gain Hatred.

choices.name: Replace Giant Blowpipe for Great Bow
Replace Giant Blowpipe for Engine of the Ancient
Replace Giant Blowpipe for Great Bow
Replace Giant Blowpipe for Engine of the Ancient
Replace Javelin and shield for Blowpipe
Replace Blowpipe with Engine of the Ancients
